summary: This document is an email chain scheduling a telephone conference regarding Jeffrey Epstein for Friday, June 13, 2008, at 10:00 AM. The participants include individuals with initials (USAFLS), (ODAG), and (SMO), who appear to be U.S. Attorney's Office and Department of Justice officials coordinating the call.

events.title: Epstein Telephone Conference
events.description: A scheduled telephone conference to discuss Jeffrey Epstein, involving officials from the U.S. Attorney's Office and the Department of Justice.

keyFacts: A telephone conference regarding Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for Friday, June 13, 2008, at 10:00 AM Eastern Time.
The email chain involves coordination between individuals with the initials (USAFLS), (ODAG), and (SMO), likely representing the U.S. Attorney's Office and the Office of the Deputy Attorney General.
The document originates from 2008 but shows metadata indicating it was created/modified in a system on April 4, 2017, suggesting it was part of a later data export or filing.
All personal names in the document are redacted, indicated by initials in parentheses, preventing the identification of specific individuals.
The subject matter is explicitly about 'Epstein', indicating official legal or investigative discussions concerning him were ongoing in June 2008.
